name: Project: Blue (Jyrux)
description:
This game was made in 2 days for the Epitech Game Jam 2.

The theme was BLUE and there was a rule that we needed to follow : 

Complete at least two of the following three challenges.

1 - Build a game entirely made of blue of nuances of blue.

2 - Use only royalty free content for musics, sprites and all.

3 - Add Zorotl in the game somewere.

I chose the later two and created this game that is experimenting a lot compared to my first one Gravity Jump.

I really do hope you have fun try this game. I has some visual and gameplay bug but it's really not that bad lmao.
